name: Lost Light (ZiuxX)
description:
Lost Light

A star has lost its light and has to get it back.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021

Collect the 50 pieces of Light and go to the Star Podium in the center to finish the game.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Light Particle

X: Light Wave

Enter: Pause / Unpause Game

M: Mute / Unmute Audio
